00179 template<typename T>
00180 inline StatusCode FileReader::ReadVariable(T &t)
00181 {
00182     char *pMemBlock = new char[sizeof(T)];
00183     m_fileStream.read(pMemBlock, sizeof(T));
00184 
00185     t = *(reinterpret_cast<T*>(pMemBlock));
00186     delete[] pMemBlock;
00187 
00188     if (!m_fileStream.good())
00189         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00190 
00191     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00192 }
00193 
00194 template<>
00195 inline StatusCode FileReader::ReadVariable(std::string &t)
00196 {
00197     unsigned int stringSize;
00198     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(stringSize));
00199 
00200     char *pMemBlock = new char[stringSize];
00201     m_fileStream.read(pMemBlock, stringSize);
00202 
00203     t = std::string(pMemBlock, stringSize);
00204     delete[] pMemBlock;
00205 
00206     if (!m_fileStream.good())
00207         return STATUS_CODE_FAILURE;
00208 
00209     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00210 }
00211 
00212 template<>
00213 inline StatusCode FileReader::ReadVariable(CartesianVector &t)
00214 {
00215     float x, y, z;
00216     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(x));
00217     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(y));
00218     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(z));
00219     t = CartesianVector(x, y, z);
00220 
00221     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00222 }
00223 
00224 template<>
00225 inline StatusCode FileReader::ReadVariable(TrackState &t)
00226 {
00227     CartesianVector position(0.f, 0.f, 0.f), momentum(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00228     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(position));
00229     PANDORA_RETURN_RESULT_IF(STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS, !=, this->ReadVariable(momentum));
00230     t = TrackState(position, momentum);
00231 
00232     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00233 }
